[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text align=”center” visibility=”hidden-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586342047930{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”icon-col col-2″ width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://mcdindia.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/2.png” image_size=”full” align=”center” el_class=”covid-icon”][vc_column_text visibility=”visible-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586342074143{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text visibility=”hidden-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586342065748{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

sitting for dine-in customers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text visibility=”hidden-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586342595105{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The body temperature
of all service workers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text visibility=”hidden-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586342605679{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Food and water
safety checks.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”icon-col col-3″ width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://mcdindia.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/9.png” image_size=”full” align=”center” el_class=”covid-icon”][vc_column_text visibility=”visible-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586342633693{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

That no product is
touched by bare hands.

Food-safety training of our staff.

Food-safety training

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”icon-col col-2″ width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://mcdindia.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/11.png” image_size=”full” align=”center” el_class=”covid-icon”][vc_column_text visibility=”visible-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586346467053{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Internal and external audits.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text visibility=”hidden-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586346472299{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Internal and
external audits.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”icon-col col-3″ width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://mcdindia.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/12.png” image_size=”full” align=”center” el_class=”covid-icon”][vc_column_text visibility=”visible-sm” el_class=”sub-heading-4 light-weight” css=”.vc_custom_1586346478347{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
